# <a name="print-an-attachment-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="fb127-102">Een bijlage afdrukken in Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fb127-102">Print an attachment in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="fb127-103">Open het e-mailbericht met de bijlage die u wilt afdrukken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fb127-103">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="fb127-104">Beweeg de aanwijzer over de bijlage en selecteer het pictogram **meer acties**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fb127-104">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **More actions** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="fb127-105">> **Download**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fb127-105">> **Download**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="fb127-106">Als het bestand is gedownload, opent u het met het juiste programma en selecteert u de optie afdrukken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fb127-106">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fb127-107">U kunt bijvoorbeeld een doc-bestand openen in Word en vervolgens afdrukken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fb127-107">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fb127-108">Zie [e-mailberichten, bijlagen en Agenda's afdrukken in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)voor meer informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fb127-108">For more information, read [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
